content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────
### Intended Lab at Position (0.5, 2.5)
This structure was meant to serve as a research facility by supplying Automation Science Packs for technology research. Multiple attempts were made to locate, craft, and place a Lab here. However, due to resource shortages and missing inventory items, the Lab was never successfully created on the map.

### Iron Smelting Furnace at Position (5.0, 5.0)
An existing furnace was retrieved and used for smelting iron ore into iron plates. Resources (iron ore and coal) were inserted and processed to boost the overall iron plate count, supporting subsequent production steps.

### Copper Smelting Furnace at Position (–27.0, –60.0)
A copper furnace was identified and utilized for processing copper ore into copper plates. In this setup, 50 units of copper ore were smelted, yielding 45 copper plates to help alleviate resource constraints for further crafting.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• API Usage Errors
  – Do not pass unsupported parameters: The get_entities function was incorrectly invoked using a keyword argument ('radius') and later with extra positional arguments. Always review the function signature and use only allowed parameters.

• Inventory and Placement Verification
  – Confirm that the required entity (e.g. Lab) is present in the inventory before attempting placement.
  – Verify that the result from entity queries is valid (i.e. not None) before iterating over it to avoid type errors.

• Crafting Chain and Resource Management
  – Ensure that all sub-ingredients needed for complex crafts (such as Lab crafting, which requires items like iron-gear-wheels and electronic circuits) are available through established production chains.
  – Double-check recipe requirements and confirm that necessary intermediate production (smelting and assembly) is set up prior to initiating a craft.
